title: Account Left AWS Organization
description: Detects when an AWS account leaves an AWS Organization. This removes any Service Control Policies (SCPs) that enforce security guardrails, potentially allowing an attacker to perform previously blocked actions.
author: Antigravity
false_positives: Authorized organizational restructuring (extremely rare and should be scheduled)
recommendation: If unauthorized, this is a catastrophic security failure. The account is now unmanaged. Contact AWS Support to regain control and audit all actions taken after the departure.
